content.task: CRITICAL SYSTEM FAILURE: Multi-agent system is in broken state. All agents report as "initializing" with system status "stopped" despite successful initialization. We need immediate diagnosis and repair of the agent state management system. This is blocking all compliance-mandated multi-agent workflows.
content.context: Root-cause analysis shows agents can be initialized but never become active. Status shows "System Status: stopped" and all 8 agents stuck in "initializing" state since 2025-09-16. Previous manual CI work violated compliance rules requiring multi-agent engagement. Need to restore multi-agent system operational status.
